page.title: 03Yattendon Green
page.content:
{Lord Iliffe}owns the village pub, the shops, and nearly all the houses. The whole thing is run by Yattendon Estates, and everything owned by the {Estate}is painted Yattendon Green. This is a real colour, specially mixed. It is a dark green about the same colour as chestnut leaves in July, somewhere between Bottle Green and British Racing Green. The story goes that it is shippped in by the tanker-load and that once {Lord Iliffe sent the whole lot back because it was'nt quite the right colour. It is also said that if you stand still for too long in the square{you}will be painted Yattendon Green.
The village fete has always been held in the grounds of{Yattendon Court but now that{Lord Iliffe}no longer lives there it has been converted into
